summary: REQ-11 appears implemented: the Hero section code no longer includes/render an for `/assets/generated/vivan-hero.dim_1200x1500.jpg`, and the layout was changed to a centered, single-column responsive design. No evidence in the diff suggests other sections were removed/broken (only HeroSection.tsx was functionally changed).

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation/file summary text claims `AircraftPhotoSection.tsx` is a "New section component" and describes additional behavior/implementation details not requested as part of this change.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to removing the Vivan portrait from the Hero section and adjusting layout; the diff includes a modified summary file that introduces/claims extra feature context beyond REQ-11.
